title: Find the Blood of Lathander
content: ssageway opened - we should see what lies within. Find a purpose for the Dawnmaster's Crest. We found an oddly shaped crest that belonged to a high priestess of Lathander. Perhaps it can help us find the Blood of Lathander? Get past the Secret Chamber's Lathandrian traps. Very elaborate traps block our path down this passageway - whatever sits at the end must be worth protecting. Retrieve the relic. We bested the Secret Chamber's traps - we should see what they were guarding. We used the Dawnmas
